body.name: N-GEN Video Gaming Chair with Footrest High Back Ergonomic Comfortable Office Computer Desk with Lumbar Support Height Adjustable with PU Leather Recliner for Adults Women Men (Red)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 20 - 22. Order within 22 hrs 29 mins.
features: New & Upgraded - Gaming chair for computer or video gamers. Comfortable high-back chair for anywhere: game room, home office, movie room, study room. Elevate your game with supreme comfort.

Comfortable & Relaxing - Unparalleled comfort with a headrest and lumbar pillow. Relax and rest your feet and legs through the large footrest. Experience ergonomic neck support and a back for good posture.
Quality Materials - The cushions, backrests, and armrests of computer gaming chairs are filled with high-density foam and made with soft, breathable, and colorful PU leather.

Essential & Must-have features - As you lean back, ergonomic linkage armrests move to support you properly. Smooth-rolling wheels and 360-degree swivel. Adjustable height with SGS-certified gas lift. Strong and sturdy steel base.

Easy Assembly - An assembly guide will be sent to your home along with all parts, hardware, and tools. The hassle-free assembly can be completed within 10-20 minutes with high-quality bolts that fit perfectly. Our customer support team is available at any time to assist with your questions or concerns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Chair and Value
reviews.reviewText: I am sitting on this chair as I write this review. I’ve been using it for a few days now with long hours of gaming. Overall I want to say how great of a chair this is. I’ve ran through many gaming chairs in the past as I play lots of games but I feel that this is the one I will be keeping it as long as it holds. From the moment I got the package to the very assembling of it felt pretty smooth and straight forward. Here is my personal opinion and breakdown of the chair:PROS- Well packaged, delivered quickly and in great condition.- The parts of the chair feel very high quality. No loose threads or scratches. Much better than expected, especially at this price point.- Assembly was a breeze as advertised which took me around 10-15min. All tools and instructions included.- Chair had a pretty good weight to it, and the faux leather felt very sturdy and smooth.- Although being an all black gaming chair, I loved how some parts of the chair is made of different textures like carbon fiber. The details are well thought out.- The seat cushion was very roomy and right amount of plushiness for me. Being a bigger guy I often have problems when sitting for longer periods, but pleasantly surprised.- The padded armrests felt very comfortable and sturdy.- Reclining worked perfect and smoothly. It doesn’t feel wobbly.CONS- I haven’t been able to use the footrest much as I am not a footrest type of guy, and it’s a tad short for myself. But I can say that it is a nice feature to have.- Doesn’t recline all the way, I assume it’s more gaming chair physics than anything.- I prefer the chair without the cushions on it except when I am reclined.TL;DRWell constructed chair that not only looks great but feels comfortable as well. Easy assembly and great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Comfortable Chair and Great Cust. Support
reviews.reviewText: This chair is quite sturdy and well made overall. It looks and feels high quality. There was a defect in the backrest I received first and their customer support responded to my report with options to make things right within minutes.Couldn't be happier with any chair below $300, because this is comparable in quality to the $500 chairs we purchased for our e-sports center. It's missing some top-end bells and whistles, and the plastic in the armrests is noticable, but this chair is the highest value I can imagine at this price point. Could easily go for $200 or more.Assembly is straightforward, but takes a bit of effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best game chair out
reviews.reviewText: I searched for weeks in my free time for this chair and I’m so glad I got this one. Don’t believe the false rumours about the back of the chair breaking. The chair is tough. Comfortable and the reclining feature locks at any position. On top of that easy to set up and looks really nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daughter absolutely loves her new chair
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift for our 24 yr old daughter. The chair is well padded and comfortable. She finds the foot rest easy to use and comfortable. It is well constructed and easy to assemble. The chair seems solid and made of quality material. I really search for a chair of high quality that ppl found a good value and comfortable and this chair checked all of those boxes. This is a great gaming and/or computer chair. She absolutely loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair becomes uncomfortable after about 45 minutes because there's just almost no foam padding on the back rest to speak of and you're basically resting on the structural board.The leg support bends downward when in use and the padding stops around my calves.I'm 5'7" & 150lb.Assembly was fairly straightforward.I'm going to replace the chair with something that's not cloned under a dozen different manufacturer names and has sufficient padding with leg supports that can hold a pair of normal sized legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Big bang for your buck!
reviews.reviewText: Simple instructions, comes with nice T handle driver for quick assembly! Comfortable and way nicer then expected! Whoever had it break on them probably needed a bigger chair or slim fast. Would buy again but I'm sure this one will last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together product is exactly as described and beautiful!!!!!! Awesome quality and super comfortable!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Messed up important components
reviews.reviewText: I overall like the look and comfort of the chair however the broken pieces cannot be overlooked or ignored.The plastic holding the chair raising lever is broken and the spring doesn't look right.The metal pieces for the locking lever are out of line and obviously bent.The chair itself still kinda works I suppose but broken parts aren't really something you should take lightly as a buyerReview might change if the seller sends me new parts timely but for now, 3 stars.I don't reccomend this chair unless seller sends replacement parts
